page.title: 03Folksworth School
page.content: FOLKSWORTH SCHOOL The school was dedicated to the Lady Geraldine Stanhope. From when Mr. Richards left here there has been a lot of changes.Now we have alsorts of clubs like athletics,football,country dancing and we have games on a Thursday.We have lots of subjects like Mathematics, English, R.E. reading and every Wednesday we have Mr Longfoot. The toilets used to be inside the hall but they are now outside.There are three classrooms and three teachers our head master is Mr Shannon.There are 68 children in Folksworth school and two dinner ladies one is called Mrs Yardy.She does cleaning and looks after us at play time. The other dinner lady is called Mrs Edwards.
